Articles.Content:
I've just upgraded my mission control building and tracking station (in this order) and now I'm wondering what is meant by "flight planning". Does this mean one can somehow plan missions before they are started? If yes, where and how?

Or, is this just a fancy name for the ability to place manoeuvre nodes?

Edited December 20, 2014 by soulsource
Thanks a lot! If I would have upgraded the tracking station first, it would have been more clear, I guess.
Are you sure this is correct? Ive upgraded my tracking station but not my mission control building and I manuver nodes.

Are you sure this is correct? Ive upgraded my tracking station but not my mission control building and I manuver nodes.

You need to upgrade both.
